Name: Bricks In The Box
About the game: Bricks In The Box is an arcade game inspired by the breakout title, in contrast to the classic version, the game takes place on boards of various shapes - hexagon, triangle, pentagon ect - the slat and hole is in the middle of the level. The player's task is to break down as many boxes as possible and to beat his own and global records.
